title: Summerhill/Grant Park 2 bedroom/1 bath / pets ok
posting_body: THIS UNIT IS TOTAL ELECTRIC
This adorable GARDEN LEVEL 2 bedroom 1 bath
Central heat and air;
New kitchen and bathrooms,
Modern closets
All Electric.
Floors are ceramic tile and all rooms have natural light.
Master bedroom features an exposed brick wall for a loft feel.
This great in-town location is close to parks and running fields.
You will be 1/2 mile (10  minutes walk, 6 blocks) from Grant Park.
You'll have quick access to Downtown, I-75 / I-85 and I-20, GA state University.
Utilities (water/sewer, electricity, and trash) are not included in the rental price.
Tenant is responsible for exterior yard maintenance.
Renters insurance is required.
This is a NON-SMOKING property.
Cats and small dogs may be permitted (pet fee/max 2 pets) with management approval prior to lease signing.
The Application Fee is $45 per occupant over age 18.
The online application is at  <URL>.
Contact us via phone/text at
show contact info
All information is deemed reliable but is not guaranteed.
